channel.title: CVE Feed for CodePeople -- CP Polls
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CodePeople -- CP Polls

item.title: CVE-2024-47297|2024-10-07T13:09:28.610Z -- codepeople -- cp%20polls
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in CodePeople CP Polls allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects CP Polls: from n/a through 1.0.74.

item.title: CVE-2024-24873|2024-07-25T13:39:11.871Z -- codepeople -- cp%20polls
item.description: : Improper Control of Interaction Frequency vulnerability in CodePeople CP Polls allows Flooding.This issue affects CP Polls: from n/a through 1.0.71.

item.title: CVE-2024-24874|2024-06-04T17:42:54.038Z -- codepeople -- cp%20polls
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Script-Related HTML Tags in a Web Page (Basic XSS) vulnerability in CodePeople CP Polls allows Code Injection.This issue affects CP Polls: from n/a through 1.0.71.

item.title: CVE-2024-24873|2024-05-17T08:24:16.872Z -- codepeople -- cp%20polls
item.description: : Improper Control of Interaction Frequency vulnerability in CodePeople CP Polls allows Flooding.This issue affects CP Polls: from n/a through 1.0.71.

item.title: CVE-2024-47297|2024-10-06T11:46:08.770Z -- codepeople -- cp%20polls
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in CodePeople CP Polls allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects CP Polls: from n/a through 1.0.74.
